2.

title: Provisions) (Covid-19) Act 2020) has defined that period as beginning on the
heading: 3. The period beginning on 1 January 2021 and ending on 9 June 2021 is
text_raw:
3. The period beginning on 1 January 2021 and ending on 9 June 2021 is 
hereby specified as the period to which the interim period as defined in section 
2 of the Companies Act 2014 (No. 38 of 2014) (amended by section 3 of the 
Act of 2020) shall be extended in respect of the amendments effected by the 
following sections of the Act of 2020: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

sections 3 to 9; 

section 11; 

sections 13 to 16; 

(d) 

sections 18 to 25. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

15 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
